            <entry>cahi1:data_114695</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Graded index fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geordnete Indexfaser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fibre évaluée d'incrément</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fibra classificada do deslocamento 
predeterminado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fibra classificata di indice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βαθμολογημένη ίνα ευρετηρίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fibra calificada del índice</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows total internal reflection in a graded index fibre (bottom) and the fibre's refractive index profile (top).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dispersion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">graded index fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">modal dispersion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">multipath dispersion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical pulse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">total internal reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt interne totalreflexion in 
einer geordneten Indexfaser (Unterseite) und im Profil Brechungsindex 
der Faser (Oberseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la réflexion interne 
totale dans une fibre évaluée d'incrément (bas) et le profil de 
l'indice de réfraction de la fibre (dessus).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a reflexão interna 
total em uma fibra classificada do deslocamento predeterminado (fundo)
e no perfil de deslocamento predeterminado refractive da fibra (alto).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la riflessione 
interna totale in una fibra classificata di indice (parte inferiore) e
nel profilo di indice di rifrazione della fibra (parte superiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συνολική εσωτερική 
αντανάκλαση σε μια βαθμολογημένη ίνα ευρετηρίων (κατώτατο 
σημείο) και το σχεδιάγραμμα διαθλαστικών ευρετηρίων της ίνας 
(κορυφή).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la reflexión interna 
total en una fibra calificada del índice (fondo) y el perfil del 
índice de refracción de la fibra (tapa).</string>
          </description>
